doSelfCrossover(Chromosome) - Method in class zujkomiller.genetic.linear.VariableSetProducer
 
doSelfCrossover(Chromosome) - Method in class zujkomiller.genetic.linear.FixedSetProducer
Because FixedSetChromosomes can not have repeated gene values, they can not be crossed with other Chromosomes, but they can do a "self" crossover, in which the end of the chromosome is exchanged with the the start of the chromosome at a random point.

E

equals(Object) - Method in class zujkomiller.genetic.Generation
Generations are considered logically equal if they contain the same set of individual Chromosomes and they have the same generationNumber.
equals(Object) - Method in class zujkomiller.genetic.linear.LinearChromosome
LinearChromosomes are logically equal if they have the same fitness score and consist of the same genes.
EvolutionObservable - interface zujkomiller.genetic.EvolutionObservable.
Classes implementing EvolutionObserver may register themselves with classes which implement this interface, EvolutionObservable, so that they will be notified when new generations are created and tested for fitness.
EvolutionObserver - interface zujkomiller.genetic.EvolutionObserver.
Classes implementing this interface, EvolutionObserver, may register themselves with classes which implement EvolutionObservable so that they will be notified when new generations are created and tested for fitness.
evolve() - Method in class zujkomiller.genetic.Evolver
This method begins processing of the generations and returns the final Generation produced.
Evolver - class zujkomiller.genetic.Evolver.
Evolver controls the execution of the genetic algorithm.
Evolver() - Constructor for class zujkomiller.genetic.Evolver
 

F

FitnessTester - interface zujkomiller.genetic.FitnessTester.
Any class implementing this interface should be able to judge a Chromosome for fitness and return an int indicating the fitness score.
FixedBagChromosome - class zujkomiller.genetic.linear.FixedBagChromosome.
A FixedBagChromosome has a fixed number of values, and its values may contain duplicates - it is a bag rather than a set.
FixedBagChromosome(short[]) - Constructor for class zujkomiller.genetic.linear.FixedBagChromosome
 
FixedBagProducer - class zujkomiller.genetic.linear.FixedBagProducer.
This class is responsible for creating an initial population of FixedBagChromosomes (Chromosomes which have a fixed length and which can have gene values repeated within them) and for creating a child Generation of FixedBagChromosomes from a parent Generation by replicating the best individuals from the parent, dropping the worst individuals, applying crossovers, and applying mutations.
FixedBagProducer(short[], int, int, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class zujkomiller.genetic.linear.FixedBagProducer
 
FixedSetChromosome - class zujkomiller.genetic.linear.FixedSetChromosome.
A FixedSetLinearChromosome has a fixed number of values, and its values may not contain duplicates - it is a set rather than a bag.
FixedSetChromosome(short[]) - Constructor for class zujkomiller.genetic.linear.FixedSetChromosome
 
FixedSetProducer - class zujkomiller.genetic.linear.FixedSetProducer.
This class is responsible for creating an initial population of FixedSetChromosomes (Chromosomes which have a fixed length and which can not have gene values repeated within them) and for creating a child Generation of FixedSetChromosomes from a parent Generation by replicating the best individuals from the parent, dropping the worst individuals, applying crossovers, and applying mutations.
FixedSetProducer(short[], int, int, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class zujkomiller.genetic.linear.FixedSetProducer
 

G

Generation - class zujkomiller.genetic.Generation.
A Generation is an array of Chromosomes and includes an int indicating this generation's number as well as the top score achieved by any individual Chromosome in this generation.
Generation(Chromosome[], int) - Constructor for class zujkomiller.genetic.Generation
 
generationCreated(Generation, int, boolean, EvolutionObservable) - Method in interface zujkomiller.genetic.EvolutionObserver
This method is called by an EvolutionObservable when a new generations has been created and tested for fitness.
generationCreated(Generation, int, boolean, EvolutionObservable) - Method in class zujkomiller.genetic.client.Genie
This method is called by an EvolutionObservable when a new generations has been created and tested for fitness.
generationNumber - Variable in class zujkomiller.genetic.Generation
 
GenerationProducer - class zujkomiller.genetic.GenerationProducer.
Subclasses of GenerationProducer are responsible for creating an initial population of Chromosomes, and then for creating a child Generation from a parent Generation by replicating the best individuals from the parent, dropping the worst individuals, performing crossovers, and performing mutations.
GenerationProducer(short[], int, int, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class zujkomiller.genetic.GenerationProducer

P

ProducerFactory - class zujkomiller.genetic.ProducerFactory.
The ProducerFactory is used to create a subclass of GenerationProducer which is appropriate for the type of genetic algorithm the user wishes to employ.

S

score - Variable in class zujkomiller.genetic.linear.LinearChromosome
 
setAlphabetSize(short) - Method in class zujkomiller.genetic.Evolver
Sets the number of different values a single gene can hold.
setChromosomeType(short) - Method in class zujkomiller.genetic.Evolver
Sets the type of chromosome which will be used.
setCrossoversPerGeneration(short) - Method in class zujkomiller.genetic.Evolver
Sets the number of crossovers to do when producing one generation from a parent generation.
setDoStopAtScore(boolean) - Method in class zujkomiller.genetic.Evolver
If this is set to true, then processing will end as soon as a Chromosome is created which has a fitness score greater than or equal to the "stopAtScore" values, otherwise, processing will continue until X number of generations have been run where X = this.numOfGenerations.
setDuplicateGenesAllowed(boolean) - Method in class zujkomiller.genetic.Evolver
If the value passed in as a parameter is true, then duplicate genes are allowed in a Chromosome, otherwise duplicate genes will not be allowed.
setFitnessScore(int) - Method in interface zujkomiller.genetic.Chromosome
Sets the fitness score of this Chromosome.
setFitnessScore(int) - Method in class zujkomiller.genetic.linear.LinearChromosome

setGenes(short[]) - Method in class zujkomiller.genetic.linear.LinearChromosome
 
setMutationsPerGeneration(short) - Method in class zujkomiller.genetic.Evolver
Sets the number of mutations to create when producing one generation from a parent generation.
setNumOfGenerationsToCreate(short) - Method in class zujkomiller.genetic.Evolver
This many generations will be produced.
setNumOfGenesPerChrom(short, short) - Method in class zujkomiller.genetic.Evolver
Sets minimum and maximum number of genes which can exist in any Chromosome.
setNumOfTimesToReplicateEach(short) - Method in class zujkomiller.genetic.Evolver
Sets the number of times to replicate each top-fitness-scorer in each generation when creating the next generation.
setNumToReplicate(short) - Method in class zujkomiller.genetic.Evolver
Sets the number of top-fitness-scoreres in each generation to replicate when creating the next generation.
setPopulationSize(short) - Method in class zujkomiller.genetic.Evolver
Each generation will have X number of Chromosomes in int where X = the size passed in as a parameter.
setStopAtScore(int) - Method in class zujkomiller.genetic.Evolver
If this is called, then processing will stop as soon as a Chromosome is created which reaches the score passed in as a parameter.

V

VariableBagChromosome - class zujkomiller.genetic.linear.VariableBagChromosome.
A VariableBagChromosome has a variable number of values, so that Chromosomes in the same Generation may be of different lengths.
VariableBagChromosome(short[]) - Constructor for class zujkomiller.genetic.linear.VariableBagChromosome
 
VariableBagProducer - class zujkomiller.genetic.linear.VariableBagProducer.
This class is responsible for creating an initial population of VariableBagChromosomes (Chromosomes which can be of variable length and which can have gene values repeated within them) and for creating a child Generation of VariableBagChromosomes from a parent Generation by replicating the best individuals from the parent, dropping the worst individuals, applying crossovers, and applying mutations.
VariableBagProducer(short[], int, int, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class zujkomiller.genetic.linear.VariableBagProducer
 
VariableSetChromosome - class zujkomiller.genetic.linear.VariableSetChromosome.
A VariableSetChromosome has a variable number of values, so that Chromosomes in the same Generation may be of different lengths.
VariableSetChromosome(short[]) - Constructor for class zujkomiller.genetic.linear.VariableSetChromosome
 
VariableSetProducer - class zujkomiller.genetic.linear.VariableSetProducer.
This class is responsible for creating an initial population of VariableSetChromosomes (Chromosomes which can be of variable length and which do not have gene values repeated within them) and for creating a child Generation of VariableSetChromosomes from a parent Generation by replicating the best individuals from the parent, dropping the worst individuals, applying crossovers, and applying mutations.
VariableSetProducer(short[], int, int, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class zujkomiller.genetic.linear.VariableSetProducer
 

Z

zujkomiller.genetic - package zujkomiller.genetic
This package contains the core classes involved in performing genetic algorithms: the controlling class (Evolver), an abstract class defining GenerationProducers, and interfaces for Chromosome and FitnessTester.
zujkomiller.genetic.client - package zujkomiller.genetic.client
The zujkomiller.genetic.client package contains the Genie class, which is the main entry point to the Genetic Algorithm Framework.
zujkomiller.genetic.linear - package zujkomiller.genetic.linear
The zujkomiller.genetic.linear package contains classes for performing genetic algorithms on linear chromosomes which have their genes arranged in a standard, sequential manner.
